item.title: Blues Rock playlist for 12/2015
item.description: Including: All Them Witches, Back Door Slam, Backwater Blues, Fleetwood Mac, Four On The Floor, Pristine, Radio Moscow, Scott Henderson, Stevie Ray Vaughan, Theodore Kidd.
